song.title: Just Machines
song.info:
1st place in amiga demo compo at Revision 2011
7th place in streaming compo at Revision 2011
Vocals: Michał Kowalonek from [url=http://www.myspace.com/snowmanpoland]Snowman[/url] band [flag]pl[/flag], Wiktor Fijałkowski, additional whispers/vocoders by the author Guitar by: Mateusz Palonek
Are we all just machines Controlled by mathematics? We dream electric dreams, Got lost in human traffic.
